## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand, account for demand variability, and avoid exceeding shelf life, ordering in multiples of 20,000 units achieves optimal inventory levels. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Player's plan is 10,000 units higher, which may lead to excess inventory and slow turnover. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 5 days                                      |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 6 days                                      |
| Comments                          | Ordering 20,000 units ensures sufficient coverage for the forecasted demand while maintaining a healthy stock turnover rate. This minimizes potential stockouts and avoids holding excess inventory for an extended period. |
